subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: England claimed a spot in the second round of the World Cup with a victory against Trinidad and Tobago, but it had to endure 83 minutes of frustration before two late goals provided relief.
snippet: England claimed a spot in the second round of the World Cup with a victory against Trinidad and Tobago, but it had to endure 83 minutes of frustration before two late goals provided relief.
